creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: three old women next to a wall--seated, kneeling and standing--each wearing black shawls
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

on back, in red ink: [(F)]; on back, in blue ink: [PHOTO BY:  ESTER PARADA]
markings: on back, stamped in black: [TOM STACK & ASSOCIATES / 1638 FARWELL AVE.  APT. 3B / CHICAGO, ILLINOIS 60626]
title: Bolivia
